channel.title: Comments on: The Sleep Lab Experience
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
It was OK... they were really nice at the lab and I managed to sleep most of the night. I'm curious mostly about the results.
Shana tova :)
item.content:encoded:
It was OK… they were really nice at the lab and I managed to sleep most of the night. I’m curious mostly about the results.

Shana tova :)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Didn't get a chance to ask you about that experience today, shana tova!
item.content:encoded: Didn’t get a chance to ask you about that experience today, shana tova!
